mapper.select: select order_id,user_id,product_image,product.product_id,product_name,orders.product_num,orders.product_price from orders left join product on orders.product_id = product.product_id where user_id = #{user_id}
select * from product left join collect on product.product_id = collect.product_id where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.delete: delete from collect where user_id = #{user_id} and product_id = #{product_id}
